entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:49 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 09:20 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -13.2°C
Wind: WSW 40 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 7. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
